name: My Love
greetingText: I really miss you dalling ko!
wishText: Always remember that I'm always here for you, mi amor. ;)
textInChatBox: Happy 18th birthday my love!! Yeeey legal age na sya! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now chat me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
